body_html: Another note, after installing with pip I also had to set the LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable to C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\lib\Win32. May want to add these steps to the readme. Thanks btw for this feature, been excited about it for a while
body_text: Another note, after installing with pip I also had to set the LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable to C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\lib\Win32. May want to add these steps to the readme. Thanks btw for this feature, been excited about it for a while
body: Another note, after installing with pip I also had to set the LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable to C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\lib\Win32. May want to add these steps to the readme. Thanks btw for this feature, been excited about it for a while
